title: They Said Tech Cant Replace Farmers But Look at This Farm Now!

tasks.task: Tilling the soil and preparing the land for planting.
subtasks: Moving farm equipment across the field.
Driving the tractor to till the ground.
Ensuring the soil is properly worked and free of clumps.
Loading the seed drill with crop seeds.
Guiding the GPS-equipped tractor along the planned path.
Planting seeds at the correct depth and spacing.
Operating a drone to fly over the fields.
Capturing high-resolution images of crops.
Analyzing images for signs of disease or nutrient deficiency.
Deploying soil moisture sensors in crops.
Connecting sensors to a central computer system.
Adjusting irrigation schedules based on real-time data.
Setting up GPS coordinates for planting.
Using a precision seeder to distribute seeds.
Adjusting planting depth and spacing parameters.
Collecting data from various sensors and drones.
Synthesizing information to optimize water use.
Adjusting farming practices based on digital insights.

tasks.task: Adjusting farming practices to reduce environmental impact.
subtasks: Minimizing water usage through smart irrigation.
Precisely applying fertilizers and chemicals.
Reducing fuel consumption with GPS-guided machinery.
Operating a drone for remote crop monitoring.
Driving a GPS-guided tractor for precise planting.
Setting up and maintaining sensor networks in the field.
